item.title: リーダーズ・ダイジェストUK編集長エヴァ・マッケビックが、「容赦のない雑誌出版の状況」を理由に、同誌が86年の歴史に幕を閉じることを発表（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Reader's Digest UK Editor-in-Chief Eva Mackevic says the magazine will close in the UK after 86 years, citing the “unforgiving magazine publishing landscape”  —  The magazine's editor said it has “come to an end” in the UK after 86 years.  —  Reader's Digest magazine has closed in the UK …

item.title: EU、フェイスブックとインスタグラムの欺瞞的広告と政治的コンテンツをめぐりDSA調査を開始、情報筋によると親クレムリンキャンペーンに関連（ブルームバーグ）
item.description:
Bloomberg:
The EU opens a DSA investigation into Facebook and Instagram over deceptive ad and political content; sources say the move relates to a pro-Kremlin campaign  —  - Probe said to target pro-Putin Doppelganger campaign  — Meta probe is under the EU's tough new Digital Services Act

item.title: BBC、ITV、Channel 4、Channel 5の合弁会社Everyone TVがスマートTVで無料ストリーミングサービスFreelyを開始、ターゲットはインターネットのみの家庭（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
Everyone TV, a joint venture between the BBC, ITV, Channel 4, and Channel 5, launches free streaming service Freely on smart TVs, targeting internet-only homes  —  The service is backed by U.K. broadcasters BBC, ITV, Channel 4, and Paramount Global's Channel 5.

item.title: UAE資本のRedBird IMIは、本日から始まるTelegraphとSpectatorのオークションから撤退し、英国の出版社への権利売却を目指す（Benoit Berthelot/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Benoit Berthelot / Bloomberg:
UAE-backed RedBird IMI withdraws from the Telegraph and Spectator auction, which starts today, and will look to sell on its rights to the UK outlets  —  After a bruising few months, UAE-backed investor RedBird IMI is withdrawing from its attempt to acquire the Telegraph newspaper and Spectator magazine …

item.title: 4M以上のフォロワーを持ち、5月にHGTVのスピンオフ番組がデビューする「Zillow Gone Wild」を支える元BuzzFeedソーシャルメディアディレクター、サミール・メズラヒのプロフィール（Rachel Kurzius/Washington Post）
item.description:
Rachel Kurzius / Washington Post:
A profile of Samir Mezrahi, the ex-BuzzFeed social media director behind Zillow Gone Wild, which has 4M+ followers and a spin-off HGTV show debuting in May  —  Samir Mezrahi posted his first outrageous house in 2020.  Now he has 4 million followers and an HGTV show on the way.

item.title: ニュースUKのTalkTVがリニアチャンネルを閉鎖し、オンラインに移行する中、英国の新興放送局であるTalkTVとGBニュースの将来は不透明だと専門家は指摘する（Alexandra Topping/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Alexandra Topping / The Guardian:
As News UK's TalkTV closes its linear channel and moves online, experts say the future of both of UK's broadcasting upstarts, TalkTV and GB News, is uncertain  —  TalkTV's shift to online only is a moment of reckoning for the two broadcasting upstarts  —  In April 2021, the boss …

item.title: テック・ジャーナリズムは、スキャンダル、センセーショナリズム、粗雑な調査によって特徴づけられることが多く、出版社は明確なROIがない限り、投資をしたがらない（Timothy B. Lee/Asterisk）
item.description:
Timothy B. Lee / Asterisk:
Tech journalism is often characterized by scandals, sensationalism, and shoddy research, and publishers are reluctant to invest in it without a clear ROI  —  A huge proportion of tech journalism is characterized by scandals, sensationalism, and shoddy research.  Can we fix it?

item.title: 2018年のリオデジャネイロ市議会議員マリエル・フランコ殺害事件は、いかにしてこの街の危険な裏社会を調査するジャーナリスト世代にインスピレーションを与えたのか（Tom Phillips/The Guardian）
item.description:
Tom Phillips / The Guardian:
How the 2018 killing of Rio de Janeiro councilor Marielle Franco inspired a generation of journalists to investigate the city's dangerous underworld  —  The killing of councillor Marielle Franco has inspired a generation of journalists to probe the city's dangerous underworld

item.title: 欧州市民自由連合は年次報告書の中で、EU全域でメディアの自由が低下しており、一部の国では「限界に近づいている」と述べている（Jon Henley/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Jon Henley / The Guardian:
In its annual report, Civil Liberties Union for Europe says media freedom is declining across the EU and “perilously close to breaking point” in some countries  —  Civil liberties network warns of decline across the bloc as a result of harm or neglect by governments

item.title: 情報筋NBCUniversalはNBAの試合をまとめて放映するために年平均約25億ドルを支払う用意がある。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: NBCUniversal is prepared to pay an average of about $2.5B per year to air a package of NBA games, as WBD makes last-ditch efforts to keep those rights  —  Comcast's NBCUniversal is prepared to pay an average of about $2.5 billion a year to air a package of National Basketball Association games …

item.description:
Benjamin Hart / New York Magazine:
Q&A with Axios CEO Jim VandeHei on AI, “smart brevity” bullet point format, Puck's and Punchbowl's business models, his new book Just the Good Stuff, and more  —  Jim VandeHei has a knack for being ahead of the curve.  In 2006, he bolted from the Washington Post with John Harris …

item.title: パラマウント、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比6％増の$76.9B、営業損失は前年同期の$120Bから$41.7Mに縮小、Paramount+は全世界で7,100万以上の加入者を達成、売上高は前年同期比51％増（Etan Vlessing/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Etan Vlessing / The Hollywood Reporter:
Paramount reports Q1 revenue up 6% YoY to $7.69B and a $417M operating loss, down from $1.2B YoY; Paramount+ hit 71M+ global subscribers with revenue up 51% YoY  —  The studio unveiled its first quarter earnings amid talk of deal-making options and a CEO shake-up.

item.title: パラマウントCEOボブ・バキッシュが退任、ブライアン・ロビンス、クリス・マッカーシー、ジョージ・チークスが「CEOオフィス」として暫定的にパラマウントを運営（The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
The Hollywood Reporter:
Paramount CEO Bob Bakish steps down; Brian Robbins, Chris McCarthy, and George Cheeks will run Paramount on an interim basis as an “Office of the CEO”  —  The entertainment company, in the midst of a sale process, has tapped Brian Robbins, Chris McCarthy and George Cheeks to run Paramount on an interim basis.

item.title: OANがトランプの元弁護士マイケル・コーエンがストーミー・ダニエルズと不倫関係にあったという記事を撤回し謝罪、金銭的損害賠償なしの和解の一環（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
OAN retracts a story that said Trump's ex-lawyer Michael Cohen had an affair with Stormy Daniels and apologizes, part of a settlement with no monetary damages  —  Michael D. Cohen's lawyers took on OAN over the false story.  The settlement came as right-wing news outlets face a barrage of defamation suits.

item.title: 情報筋シャリー・レッドストーン、Skydanceの "最善かつ最終的な "申し出の一部として、パラマウントの株式を20億ドル以下で買い取ることに合意。
